about_the_game:
She’s cute, she’s funny, and she’s here to cheer you on to victory in battle! Fully voiced Anime-inspired Commander Steam-chan takes the helm in this helpful starter DLC that features everything you need to put your virtual naval career on track, including ships!

This package includes:

  • American Commander Steam-chan with 6 skill points
  • Premium Tier II American cruiser Albany with a Port slot
  • Five Years on Steam patch symbol
  • Five Years on Steam patch background
  • Mission: Complete 15 battles to receive your choice of one of the following researchable ships:
    • Tier IV Japanese destroyer Isokaze
    • Tier IV American cruiser Phoenix
    • Tier IV German battleship Moltke
    • Tier IV British aircraft carrier Hermes  
  • 1,500,000 Credits
  • 12 “Credits +40%” expendable economic bonuses
  • 12 “Ship XP +200%” expendable economic bonuses
  • 12 “Commander XP +200%” expendable economic bonuses
  • 12 “Free XP +600%” expendable economic bonuses
  • 10 Juliet Charlie signals
  • 10 Victor Lima signals
  • 10 India X-Ray signals
  • 10 Sierra Mike signals
  • 10 November Foxtrot signals

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

This DLC can only be unlocked with World of Warships game accounts that were created through Steam.

This DLC can only be unlocked with World of Warships game accounts that were created through Steam.
